actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy and Minority Enterprise Development

official_title: To amend the Small Business Act to eliminate a restriction on the maximum term of disaster loans available to businesses able to obtain credit elsewhere.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to repeal the maximum three-year disaster loan limitation term placed upon small business concerns that: (1) are able to obtain credit elsewhere; and (2) had loans made to them with respect to a disaster commencing on or after October 1, 1987.

titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to eliminate a restriction on the maximum term of disaster loans available to businesses able to obtain credit elsewhere.
